channel.title: CVE Feed for silabs.com -- Ember ZNet
channel.description: The latest CVEs for silabs.com -- Ember ZNet

item.title: CVE-2022-24938|2024-08-03T04:29:01.654Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet
item.description: A malformed packet causes a stack overflow in the Ember ZNet stack. This causes an assert which leads to a reset, immediately clearing the error.

item.title: CVE-2022-24939|2024-08-03T04:29:01.633Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet
item.description: Â A malformed packet containing an invalid destination address, causes a stack overflow in the Ember ZNet stack. This causes an assert which leads to a reset, immediately clearing the error.
